notes: Negative = “Ruled Out”. Our total is slightly higher than the state’s site because their total is only from public health labs. notes: Only positives reported regularly. Add deaths to the positive count. Unclear if the total is "total tests" or "total people tested." For now we assume it's "total people tested."
